DOC.detailed_description: Patients > 18 year type B aortic dissection randomize either thoracic aortic endoprosthesis ( stent-grafting ) antihypertensive management ( medical treatment ) . Only stable patient without spontaneous false lumen thrombosis 14 day index dissection consider eligible study inclusion . Long-term outcome measure include all-cause mortality , aorta-specific mortality cluster endpoint ( reflect progression disease , conversion additional intervention ) ; analysis base 140 randomized case follow least 5 year .
